attributes.action: change employment law to ensure maternity returners are not over-accomodated to the detriment of childless workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People returning from maternity leave and requesting flexible working are being overly-accomodated resulting in unfair treatment of workers without children. Just because someone does not have children it should not mean that they are afforded less rights than those with children.
